website_summaries.verdict: This fluted-edge pastry cutter is great for making decorative cuts and patterns.
pros: Great for lattice crusts, fluted edges, and other decorative cuts
cons: Wheel is not terribly sharp, so it sometimes requires more than one pass to cut

customer_reviews.title: Just don't but this product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. This wheel is very poorly constructed it is something you can buy at your local dollar store for much less money. When you roll the device over the dough it wobbles from side to side because the tolerances between the wheel and the pin that holds it in place are so poor. It is not professional quality as advertised. The grip handle is only 3 1/2 inches long and less than 1 inch wide. It’s difficult to hold. The wheel is about 1 3/8 inch diameter and is difficult to roll through the dough. Just don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.author: R.W. Duval

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Hand Tool
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of pastry and pasta making from scratch, and this is a tool I really love. Fits my hand nicely, puts a pretty edge on lasagna sheets, farfalle, other rolled pasta edges. Makes a nice edge on ravioli, pirogie, and other filled doughs.
customer_reviews.author: ArdecyPc

customer_reviews.title: A decent job for your ravioli
customer_reviews.text: Decent ravioli wheel for the price. Ie you pay for what you get. If you really want sharp, crisp edges without any bit of dough that didn't cut through all the way/getting stuck and then you having to run the blade back over it/tearing it, then you should probably buy the 49 dollar dual sided brass one made in Italy. BUT, for the price this one will get the job done albeit a bit slower and not as clean or professional looking.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Li

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make my homemade dog treats. I just roll out the dough to about a 3/16th inch thickness and use this wheel with the zig-zag edge to cut them into 1 inch squares. When I bake them, the edges stay defined and pretty. It's a great little tool for not much money and really does the job well! It was a very good purchase for me and my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, works great to cut the lattice for pies!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make homemade ravioli's for the first time recently so I bought this. It is nearly identical to the one that my grandma had, including the little ringing sound that it makes when you spin the wheel in the air. Anyway, it cut and sealed the ravioli's very well. Quick note - when you press the top layer of pasta dough over the filling, make sure to systematically get the air out from the ravioli pockets otherwise it won't matter much how good of a pasta wheel you have.
customer_reviews.author: JTC

customer_reviews.title: Great little ravioli wheel
customer_reviews.text: Great little ravioli wheel. I have used it when making ravioli with wonton wrappers. After I drop the filling on one, I brush a little egg around the edges, fold it over, the seal it with the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorBoyMom

customer_reviews.title: Could have bought something like this at Wal-Mart
customer_reviews.text: Could have bought something like this at Wal-Mart. Thought I was buying a high quality item. Went to use it, downward pressure and pushing it only locks up the wheel and tears the dough.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Gennette

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and useful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to make ravioli. It is comfortable to hold and makes quick work of pasta dough.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: worked perfectly, i just needed something quick and cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: worked perfectly, i just needed something quick and cheap to make ravioli and this did the trick! cut right through my dough :]
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price! Nice and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom to make pastries and she loves it.. gives the cookie a cute look.
customer_reviews.author: christina hatkewitz

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pastry wheel and ravioli cutter. Very easy to use and probably the most affordable option.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Made crimping both my homemade raviolis and perogis not only picture perfect but sealed them tightly!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Tondo

customer_reviews.title: Good ravioli
customer_reviews.text: We made our first ravioli with this tool and it is Awesome! We cut them easily, it is not sharp, so it didn't cut it without merging the two layers wich is very useful, we did not have to touch the border again, it was sealed and shaped at once!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: I love this little ravioli wheel
customer_reviews.text: I love this little ravioli wheel. I had initally purchased a ravioli stamp but found it difficult to use. This wheel is so much easier, the only thing I need to work on is perfect squares. :)
customer_reviews.author: carole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used this to cut shortbread cookies. Worked just like it was supposed to.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made- fell apart immediately.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of a wheel cutter as my first attempt came in broken. This wheel seems to be well built and so far has held up well for making pasta.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love that as you are cutting the pasta it seals the dough

customer_reviews.title: RIP Ravioli Stamp.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a ravioli stamp for years to make my ravioli. It's a real pain! THIS WORKS SO MUCH BETTER!!!

customer_reviews.text: tool works fairly well, but sometimes you need to go over the seam twice with the roller to cut the noodles.

customer_reviews.title: It does its job however not the best quality. The blade is not as sharp as ...
customer_reviews.text: It does its job however not the best quality. The blade is not as sharp as I would expect.
customer_reviews.author: mattyjenks21

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Really dull. Doesn’t “roll” will tear your dough. Spend the extra $ and get a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Rane Cegelski

customer_reviews.title: This product is just ok. You really have to ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is just ok. You really have to press hard for it to cut even with very thin pasta dough.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie P

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & well made Ravioli Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to make fresh homemade ravioli. I considered buying one of those dual-wheel contraptions, but instead decided on this single version. I figured if I want to cut straight pasta, I can just use a pizza cutter to get the same result. This particular ravioli wheel appears to be sturdy and well made. The wheel moves freely and smoothly. The black plastic handle is comfortable to grip. Additionally, the hole at the end of the handle was an important feature because I hang the majority of my kitchen tools from the hooks on a magnetic knife strip. I'm assuming if this is washed quickly and well maintained, it should last you a while.
customer_reviews.author: SeaGoddess3240

customer_reviews.title: it was a good choice for the
customer_reviews.text: Well made and heavy, will last a long time, it was a good choice for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gadget
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the quality of this little gadget: it's sturdy and rolls smoothly and evenly. I use it mainly for pastry and creates beautiful edges. Easy to clean, too.
customer_reviews.author: Tylla Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful item for kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this kitchen tool. Works great for pie cutting, cookies, pasta etc. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty design but must put a lot of pressure to cut
customer_reviews.text: It makes a beautiful shape for cutting pastries, but you have to press really hard to cut.
customer_reviews.author: Starlight22

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: This cutter is great. I have used it to make pizza pockets and cheese crackers. It has a nice, hearty weight to it. It cuts through the doughs well, yet it can also be used to just "crimp" should you need that.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Nice kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little gadget to have in the kitchen. I used it to cut cracker dough! Very good quality and price.

customer_reviews.text: Works great for cutting designs in pastries. Easy to use.

customer_reviews.text: I use this to close home made calzones, ravioli and pies.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: It says professional quality. I expected better. Seems to be plastic coated. Not going to use it. I'll buy elsewhere.

customer_reviews.title: Cool little tool for a small price.
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for my homemade Cheese-It's. Many uses for pretty edges!

customer_reviews.title: Lattice Pie Crust Wheel
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these years ago but it disappeared over several moves. Well made tool for cutting perfect and elegant lattice pie crust.

customer_reviews.title: Good for cutting home made ravioli.
customer_reviews.text: Works for cutting home-made ravioli. Not sharp, which is good for ravioli so it pinches the dough together as it cuts.
customer_reviews.author: HomeShopper

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Use it for pie crusts, and pasta. Works easily, washes up well. Great product for the price! Nice!

customer_reviews.title: A quality kitchen tool...
customer_reviews.text: This quality product certainly adds to the chefs experience by providing the reliability to produce the results that one looks for by purchasing an item as this...

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is perfect for raviolis, I really recommend it, it cuts and seals the pasta at the same time. Thumbs up.

customer_reviews.title: Broke on removing from box
customer_reviews.text: Roller pin fell out within 20 seconds of opening box and will not go in. Probably worth spending a few extra dollars for something a bit sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Knetzger

customer_reviews.title: but I am feeling very good about it and don't expect any issues
customer_reviews.text: This came loose in a box of a larger order (not packaged), however, the first thing I noticed when I picked it up is how heavy and high quality it is. The wheel rolls smoothly. This is not cheaply made at all. I have not used it yet, but I am feeling very good about it and don't expect any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Construction - but never used... maybe dog ran off with it?
customer_reviews.text: Well, it came in the mail... I loved how it looked and it didn't look cheap at all. The blade looked like it would work well. Unfortunately, I haven't seen it since I opened the package! Not sure if the dog ran off with it or it got thrown out accidentally. So .. I'll probably buy another just based on the appearance of the quality of construction.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Anna

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this item back as the cutter fell off the handle when I took it out of the box. There is no screw on the item that I could have reattached it on the handle. Needless to say, I did not reorder this product.
customer_reviews.author: Smittie

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting edges of the dough
customer_reviews.text: Great for cutting edges of the dough! I love it
customer_reviews.author: gloria morrison

customer_reviews.title: but it worked fine.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once, but it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great "helper"
customer_reviews.text: If you want to make a special edging on your pie crust or ravioli this tool works like a charm. It makes your project look rather professional. Try it.....I think you will like it.

customer_reviews.title: great success! Very forgiving for an amateur
customer_reviews.text: I've made ravioli with this twice so far and both times, great success! Very forgiving for an amateur.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Just right Kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: Fit my needs just right. It is on the small side, very light yet sturdy and so easy to clean. This looks and feels like it will last for a very long time. It crimps and/or cuts the dough depending on pressure. We both like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Pastry Cutter
customer_reviews.text: This pastry cutter works great, it is very firm and steady, and it cuts through dough with no ripping or tearing. It makes nice edges. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be well built
customer_reviews.text: Not having purchased this for myself but for a gift cannot give it 5 stars. Still waiting for feed back , may end up buying one for myself then revisit the rating.

customer_reviews.title: Iffy
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a little bit cheap, I have not used it yest but that is the first feeling i had
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Using for ravioli
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas to go with the hand made ravioli roller we purchased. We can't wait to make our first batch of ravioli.
customer_reviews.author: rhelms

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your use
customer_reviews.text: The roller is sturdy and well constructed. Probably works great on raviolis. It does NOT, however, work well on cutting crackers. So, I would take a leap and extend this to any long bit of dough you need to cut. The shape of the cut is also a bit extreme. The grooves go very deep and jagged and too aggressive for me.
customer_reviews.author: tracy gribbon

customer_reviews.title: Form and Function!
customer_reviews.text: This ravioli wheel crimps the edge of the pasta, sealing in the delicious filling and makes the edges pretty! Easy to clean, does it's job, and the right price...you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Elsie B

customer_reviews.title: Really does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use it to score/cut low carb sheets of lavash to dry in oven to make low carb crackers....does a GREAT job. Also makes lovely edges on the low carb lattice pastry I bake. Very happy with it, much superior to the wooden "classic" I was using.
customer_reviews.author: LTC

customer_reviews.title: Love my gadgets
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a culinary major at a nearby college and the two of us are having lots of fun making our own pasta. For our lasagna noodles and raviolis we wanted the fancy edge that you get from bought noodles and we got it from this tool. We just throw it in the dishwasher after use. It does exactly what we wanted and what we expected from this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent appearance for the pastries
customer_reviews.text: I use this tool when I cut the pastry dough for my chicken and pastries dish, North Carolina style. Excellent appearance for the pastries. Used appropriately ten times and cleaned in the dishwasher. It's held up well. My lady friends try to take it home! 100% man chef here. Highly recommend. A++
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m rolling rolling rolling
customer_reviews.text: I like this for cutting ravioli. Easy to clean and makes ravioli making way easier. My only complaint was that it took multiple passes to cut through the fresh pasta. But it makes a great seal that you can trust in hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Al Dub

customer_reviews.title: multi purpose tool
customer_reviews.text: i like this tool. i use it for fruit tarts, puff pastry recipes and even some types of cookies. a good clean decorative cut.
customer_reviews.author: claudia sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Functional kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Used to cut dough strips for top of pie. Great for occasional use. Seems sturdy and no problems cutting through dough.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used this the same day it arrived to make Danish Kringler cookies. It worked great and was very sturdy as compared to pastry wheels I had before. This one will last. Washed up easily and stayed in new condition.

customer_reviews.title: Handle Shape
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the shape of the handle or the material the handle was Mande from. Sent it back.

customer_reviews.text: This wheel is what I was missing in the kitchen. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Pastry cutter
customer_reviews.text: My 50 year old pastry cutter finally bit the dust. When I received this cutter I couldn't believe how nicely it worked. No problems with pie dough rolling up with the cutter, it rolls smoothly and perfectly every time.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: A small wheel in diameter, but the quality is good!

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to use on almond crackers I make ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on almond crackers I make and it ripped the dough and the dough stuck to it. It may be operator error. The dough may of been too thin or not chilled enough. I will update after I try again

customer_reviews.text: This is a cool addition to a kitchen drawer. It makes homemade ravioli more fun and easy, and has a nice grip. I only don't give it 5 stars because it requires more pressure to use than expected, so you may need to re-roll over the dough.

product_meta.title: Better Houseware Pastry and Ravioli Wheel
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1| Style Name:blackBetter Houseware Corp. is focused on innovating solutions for the kitchen with our custom-designed ravioli and pastry wheel.
feature_bullets: Ideal for pasta or lattice crusts or for making other decorative cuts in any kind of pastry or cookie dough
Ideal for cutting dough and crimping edges of pies, pastries and ravioli
